answers.answer: i did 6 months of combo w regular interferon in 2000 and 6 months of peg/ribo this year...i am watching the simplex carbs and taking metformin to lower my blood sugar. iam hoping that if i lose more weight and reverse my fatty liver, that my blood sugar will be easier to control
thanks for your support...i hope that i wont ever have to treat again...alan

Way to go Alan! Such great news! I bet you can hardly believe it!I am so happy for you, that is excellent. Looks like you did it! Thanks for keeping us posted, please post your 3 month or 6 month results ok?

question: i just heard my the results of my one month post tx labsmy PCR is still negative as it has been since the 2nd week of tx.i'm a 2B and i did tx in 2000, but relapsed after one month..this time i am undetectable after 6 weeks.that is the first hurdle..now i have to get control of my high blood sugar..i also have a fatty liver that i am trying to reverse to help out with my blood sugar..anyone else have diabetes? any suggestions?..i have lost 15 lbs since i started on tx and have been feeling great since tx ended..i'm trying to get back into jogging and daily execise and controlling my diet..thanks, alan
title: One month post tx GOOD News
